# Alpaca WebSocket Client Requirements

# WebSocket client library
websockets>=12.0

# MessagePack for efficient encoding
msgpack>=1.0.7

# Core dependencies
aiohttp>=3.9.0
asyncio>=3.4.3

# Alpaca Python SDK (optional, for REST API integration)
alpaca-py>=0.13.0

# Monitoring and metrics
prometheus-client>=0.19.0

# Logging enhancements
python-json-logger>=2.0.7

# Development dependencies
pytest>=7.4.0
pytest-asyncio>=0.21.0
pytest-cov>=4.1.0
pytest-mock>=3.11.0

# Type checking
mypy>=1.7.0
types-aiofiles>=23.2.0
